q_ch: Master Cutters当前已完成的裁剪任务有哪些？
q_en: Which cutting tasks have been completed by Master Cutters?
gt:
Hey there! 😄

I've got the info you need about the cutting tasks completed by the "Master Cutters" working group. Here's a quick look at the task:

| Task ID |
|---------|
|    3    |

Looks like task number 3 has been successfully completed by the Master Cutters. If you have any more questions or need further details, feel free to ask! 🛠️✨

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Master Cutters';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the working group with the name "Master Cutters"

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id FROM cutting_tasks ct WHERE ct.working_group_id = '3' AND ct.status = 2;
steps.description: Retrieve the completed cutting tasks for the working group "Master Cutters"
